text.title: Plane crash in Illinois kills seven
text.head: Plane crash in Illinois kills seven
Sources

list.item: David Mercer and Jason Keyser (Associated Press). "Illinois State athletic staffers among 7 dead in plane crash" — WWBT , April 7, 2015
